children.title: Equipment Mounting:
children.content:
1.
Install filter assemblies on cast-in-place concrete equipment base(s). Comply with requirements
for equipment bases and foundations specified in [Section 033000 "Cast-in-Place Concrete."]

children.title: B.
children.content: Position each filter unit with clearance for normal service and maintenance. Anchor filter holding f...

children.title: C.
children.content: Install filters in position to prevent passage of unfiltered air.

children.title: D.
children.content: Install filter gage for each filter bank.

children.title: E.
children.content: Do not operate fan system until filters (temporary or permanent) are in place. Replace temporary fil...

children.title: F.
children.content: Install filter-gage static-pressure tips upstream and downstream from filters. Install filter gages ...

children.title: G.
children.content:
Coordinate filter installations with duct and air-handling unit installations.
3.2

children.title: A.
children.content:
Testing Agency: [Owner will engage] [Engage] a qualified testing agency to perform tests and
inspections.

children.title: B.
children.content: Manufacturer's Field Service: Engage a factory-authorized service representative to test and inspect

children.title: C.
children.content: Perform the following tests and inspections[ with the assistance of a factory-authorized service

children.title: representative]:
children.content:
1.
Operate automatic roll filters to demonstrate compliance with requirements.
2.
Test for leakage of unfiltered air while system is operating.

children.title: D.
children.content: Air filter will be considered defective if it does not pass tests and inspections.

children.title: E.
children.content:
Prepare test and inspection reports.
3.3

children.title: A.
children.content:
After completing system installation and testing, adjusting, and balancing air-handling and air-
distribution systems, clean filter housings and install new filter media.

children.title: A.
children.content: Protect installed products and accessories from damage during construction.
